metadata.title: Wednesday, 3rd December, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when the Government will introduce the Livestock Development Programme in Lubansenshi Parliamentary Constituency;
(b)    what types of livestock will be introduced; and
(c)    which areas in the Constituency will be covered.

questions.minister: Vice President which categories of officers in the Public Service are entitled to a motorcade escort.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply: Resumption of Debate. Heads 87/01, 51/01, 51/02, 51/03, 51/04, 51/05, 51/06, 51/07, 51/08, 51/09, 51/10, 21/01, 37/01, 37/02, 37/04, 37/06, 37/07, 37/08, 37/09, 37/10, 37/11, 37/12, 37/13 and 37/14 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 87    -    Anti-Corruption Commission Head 51    -    Ministry of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication Head 21    -    Loans and Investments - Ministry of Finance Head 37    -    Ministry of Finance
